summary.span: 为 提供当用户在设计期间尚未执行所需的设计器操作时要显示的标志符号。

span.span: Provides a glyph for an to display when a user has not performed required designer actions at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 活动设计器使用 显示与设计器图面上的智能标记关联的操作。Activity designers use to display actions associated with smart tags on the designer surface. 例如，如果活动要求用户设置属性，则活动设计器将显示 以通知他们需要设置属性。For example, if an activity requires users to set a property, the activity designer displays to help notify them that they are required to set the property.
